where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| NOT ( SIZEOF ([ 'AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP', 'AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.FACETED_BREP', 'AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MAPPED_ITEM', 'AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.AXIS2_PLACEMENT_3D' ] * TYPEOF (it)) = 1) )) = 0
where.label: WR1

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| ( SIZEOF ([ 'AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP', 'AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MAPPED_ITEM' ] * TYPEOF (it)) = 1) )) > 0
where.label: WR2

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( msb <* QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP' IN TYPEOF (it)) )| NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( csh <* msb_shells(msb)| NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( fcs <* csh\connected_face_set.cfs_faces| NOT ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.ADVANCED_FACE' IN TYPEOF (fcs)) )) = 0) )) = 0) )) = 0
where.label: WR3

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( msb <* QUERY ( it <* items| ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP' IN TYPEOF (it)) )| ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.ORIENTED_CLOSED_SHELL' IN TYPEOF (msb\manifold_solid_brep.outer)) )) = 0
where.label: WR4

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( brv <* QUERY ( it <* items| ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.BREP_WITH_VOIDS' IN TYPEOF (it)) )| NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( csh <* brv\brep_with_voids.voids| csh\oriented_closed_shell.orientation )) = 0) )) = 0
where.label: WR5

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( mi <* QUERY ( it <* items| ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF (it)) )| NOT ('AIC_ADVANCED_BREP.ADVANCED_BREP_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF (mi\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)) )) = 0
where.label: WR6
